channel.description:
[img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/smf2/MGalleryItem.php?id=513[/img] [size=18pt]Daemonx 317[/size] Server Features:
[ul][li]Dedicated Server[/li] [li]T1 Line [size=8pt](We traded cable and home phone for epic internet)[/size][/li] [li]vBulletin until 2012[/li] [li]Webserver[/li] [li]IRC Server[/li] [li]Webclient[/li] [li]Online 24.7 (aside from updates)[/li] [li]Moderated Economy[/li] [li]Daily player file backups[/li] [li]All 4 godwars NPCs[/li] [li]Medium Droprates and Rare distributions[/li] [li]Gambling NPC[/li] [li]Premium Points system with paid or earned rewards[/li] [li]PK Points with rewards/drops/shop npc[/li][/ul]
[hr] [size=14pt]Staff[/size] [hr] [size=10pt][b]2 Owners - Morningstar, Mickey[/b] [b]3 Admins - Scottie, Echo, (promoting)[/b] [b]5 Moderators - Monty, Ellie, (Shammii), (x), (x)[/b] [b]3 Writers - (x), (x), (x)[/b] [b]3 Artists - Scottie, (x), (x)[/b][/size] [hr] [center][size=36pt]Server Features[/size][/center] [center][img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_23.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_26.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_27.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_29.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_31.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_41.png[/img] [img]http://0320063.netsolhost.com/562Screens/Capture_42.png[/img][/center] [size=14pt][b][center]I'll change the pics over to 317 once I take more.[/center][/b][/size]
